name: Rick Shaw's Radical Rickshaw
description:
ALL ABOARD RICK SHAW'S RICKSHAW!

*WEBGL PERFORMANCE IS REAL BAD. WE SUGGEST DOWNLOADING WINDOWS VERSION*

(Remaster, originally released November 9, 2003*)

In the peaceful coastal town of Del Luna, on the eve of the blood moon, all the townsfolk are on high alert for Rick Shaw and his fateful rickshaw. 

You play as this frightful poltergeist who joins together the townsfolk and takes them for involuntary rickshaw rides across town. 

However, if you don't drop them off at a spirit zone before your magic runs out, your powers will be depleted and your haunting will be through until the next blood moon. 

*This is a joke

CONTROLS:

WASD to steer the rickshaw (you can never go back)

CREDITS:

Creative Director/Beach Town Architect - Jacob Surovsky

Head Technical Artist/lesser programmer - Zack Rock

Head of Engineering/ Voice of "Generic Man"/Voice of "English Dandy"/Voice of "Rick Shaw" - Wyatt Bushnell

Created in ~24 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam. Prompt: joined together.
